channel.title: Server Status
channel.description:
On the server status page, people are using IP's such as world1-130.runescape.com over and over and ones such as sites with port 80
I think this is unfair, meaning if their server is offline like most of them there server is still up on the server status because of the cheating IPS and ports they put up there, giving other people no chance to advertise their own server.

item.title: Server Status
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

Yes, I saw Jag3x with port 80. But they are using the ports 1-160. Almost like runescape. And they have changed to 525. Not sure though. I think if you don’t have port 5555 or 43596, Instead of 80, why don’t they add 43596 and 55555 to? It’s complicating.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This is being worked on by Moparisthebest, it’ll probably be fixed soon.

Read full topic
